title: Mobile Bridge API
description: The format used by the Mobile Bridge API. This format is used for all cross-platform and hybrid mobile frameworks.

interface.description: An interface allowing a cross platform app to interact with the native SDKs.

documentation.description: A documenting description of the interface.

type.description: The return type of the method. It can be void, a primitive (int, float, double, string, boolean, list or map), or a custom data class (which must be defined in the document)

documentation.description: A documenting description of the method.

type.description: The type of the parameter. It can be a primitive (int, float, double, string, boolean, list or map), or a custom data class (which must be defined in the document).

documentation.description: A documenting description of the property.

data.description: A data structure used to pass information through the bridge to and from the native SDKs

name.description: The name of the data structure.

documentation.description: A documenting description of the data structure.

properties.description: The list of data structure properties.

type.description: The type of the property. It can be a primitive (int, float, double, string, boolean, list or map), or a custom data class (which must be defined in the document).

documentation.description: A documenting description of the property.

mandatory.description: Whether the property is mandatory or not.
